trans-unit.source: The title of the stage. Only used for internal naming.
The text shown with this stage note.
Which context should trigger this note?
The host on which the stage note is shown.
The color of the stage note. Must contain HEX color code with leading hash.
The size of the stage note. It can be small or large. Small only contains the text and a little bit of padding, large is 100% width.
Determines the position of the stage note. Whether on top of the browser or at the bottom.
